message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you for $120. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $95 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm confident this product is worth more. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
